text: Michael Belcourt (born 29 August 1964) is a Canadian former cyclist. He competed in the individual pursuit at the 1992 Summer Olympics. In the qualifying round, he came in 15th place, advancing to Group B quarter-finals. He competed against Ivan Beltrami in Heat 3 of the Group B quarter-finals. Belcourt did not move on to the semi-finals. He was inducted into the Québec Cycling Hall of Fame in November of 2012. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Canada Category:Cyclists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Montreal
title: Michael Belcourt
